game.name: Stickman Archer Mr Bow
game.description:
Get ready to put your archery skills and techniques to test to ensure your win in this one of the best shooting games for boys â€“ Stickman Archer: Mr Bow! It will be amazing to control a dynamic roster of hero with multiple amazing different abilities in this intense physic-based archery game. Apart from your reliable bow, there are plenty of other varieties of weapons like Shovel, Brick, Tennis Ball and more to be explored. This brand new free online game comes with a great level of fun and entertainment. 

Shooting the enemies before they kill you can give you a matchless fun and thrill. In this cool action game, you have to keep killing the enemies to help Mr. Bow until he clears all the levels. Although the present level can be more challenging & complicated than the previous one, targeting your enemies at the right angle can assist you to manage any obstacles and move to the advanced level. You have to fight against the strongest man of the team of your enemies at the end of each level. So, keep playing well till the end to clear any level. 

The most important thing is that every killing or headshot can help you obtain some lovely gifts. So, try to shoot your enemies as accurately as possible to add them to your final score in this beautifully-designed free online archery game. You can use the gifts and extra points to upgrade the power of your bow and unlock new skins as well. We are sure that the action-filled in the game will not let you get bored for a single minute. Try out our more games that feature other popular characters!!
